alert.note: Alert for Butler; Franklin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 9:40PM CDT until August 11 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Franklin County in north central Iowa... Southwestern Butler County in north central Iowa... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 940 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chapin, or 5 miles northeast of Hampton, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hampton, Allison, Sheffield, Dumont, Bristow, Hansell, Chapin, Aredale, and Beeds Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
